name: Raskolnikov
desc: Employed at the titanic Kuuvahki Experimental Design Bureau, Poruchik Raskolnikov fulfills his role as a cog in the machine perfectly, executing every order without question, and doing his duty in silence and with precision.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Tattered Warrant
dropMaterial.desc:
A warrant issued to members of the Fatui Oprichniki.
One wonders what resolve drove its bearer to sign up.

dropMaterial.name: Immaculate Warrant
dropMaterial.desc:
A warrant issued to members of the Fatui Oprichniki.
One wonders if the exquisite styling might hide a price paid for its owner's promotion.

dropMaterial.name: Frost-Etched Warrant
dropMaterial.desc:
A warrant issued to members of the Fatui Oprichniki.
Adorned by a frost-colored crystal — a symbol of glory. One wonders what deeds its bearer must have performed to prove their loyalty and worth.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Frost-Etched Warrant
customize.desc:
A warrant issued to members of the Fatui Oprichniki.
Adorned by a frost-colored crystal — a symbol of glory. One wonders what deeds its bearer must have performed to prove their loyalty and worth.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.text:
Avoid getting hit by any of Raskolnikov's Electro attacks.
<color=#ffd780>World Level must reach 9</color>

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Artful Device Replica
customize.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Just as the legendary thief's tools have been imitated by countless others, so has his name.
In a sense, it was not the people who thirsted for something more who stole Reed Miller's name, but rather Reed Miller who stole the identity that was originally theirs alone. These viewpoints are just two sides of the same coin.

value.name: Oprichniki Fireblade Shock Trooper
value.desc:
An elite officer of the Fatui Oprichniki who specializes in close combat using a giant blade.
Whether it be in the war against the dark calamity or against those ignoramuses who dare stand against the Tsaritsa's ideals, those who breach at the tip of the spear suffer the greatest casualties. As such, those who survive multiple battles are naturally the elite of the elite. There will always be those willing to become the fire and sword of the empire, just as there will always be those who chafe against the injustice of fate and the inequity of the Old World.

value.name: The Shoemaker's Children Go Barefoot
value.desc: The massive facility on Paha Isle seems to hide many secrets...
